snippet: Thomas Bjorn made a 12-foot birdie putt on the first playoff hole to defeat Craig Lee and win the European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland.
abstract: Thomas Bjorn wins European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Bjorn made a 12-foot birdie putt on the first playoff hole to defeat Craig Lee and win the European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland.
